title: 50 Ways to Cut Expenses and Save More Money
excerpt: Practical tips to reduce spending and increase your savings rate.
editorial_summary: This article provides 50 actionable tips for cutting expenses across categories like housing, transportation, food, entertainment, and subscriptions. It includes both small changes (cutting cable) and larger strategies (downsizing housing), helping readers identify areas where they can reduce spending without sacrificing quality of life. Includes worksheets for tracking expenses.
